# supportsFunctionPointers

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the device supports function pointers in compute kernel functions.

## Declaration

```swift
var supportsFunctionPointers: Bool { get }
```

## Checking function pointer support

- **supportsFunctionPointersFromRender**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the device supports function pointers in render functions.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the device supports function pointers in render functions.
